content:
/>
XIV.4.B.5.f
.
Disclosure of the Report
IIRs are property of the IRS subject to disclosure restrictions under Federal law and IRS rules and regulations and may not be disclosed to anyone outside the agency.
Reference
:  For more information on language to use when responding to a request for an IIR outside the agency, see
M21-1, Part XIV, 4.B.3.g
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section B - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match: Safeguarding
